name: Kurasame
abilities: When Kurasame enters the field, select 1 of the 2 following actions. "Choose up to the same number of Characters as the Ice Backups you control. *Dull* them and *Freeze* them." "Your opponent discards 1 card for each Ice Backup you control.
%Blizzaga% {s}: Choose one Forward. Deal it 9000 damage.
